name: Staffroom Chronicles: The Whiteboard War
description:
USE FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

Description

Staffroom Chronicles: The Whiteboard War is a short tower defense game with a unique shop system inspired by auto-battlers.

Build your army 

In order to defeat the various characters of the workplace, you will need to place many towers of each type. 

Each tower has their own strengths and weaknesses: 

Ballista

The Ballista will wreak havoc to a single target, but can be overwhelmed with a large group of enemies. Great for bringing down the boss enemies.

Cannon

The Cannon specializes in dealing with large groups of regular enemies, but deals less damage to each unit than the Ballista. 

Wall

The Wall will stop enemies in their track, hurting them with thorns in it's blue and pink versions. However, enemies push back and will eventually break each wall for the rest of that round. Works great when combined with other damage dealing towers that can rain fire on stationary enemies.

The Shop

Inspired by auto-battlers, the shop must be leveled up to increase the odds of finding the rarer (and better) units. You can also pay less than leveling up to gamble with your current odds and try to find better units you may need for the challenge ahead.


This game was made by Corben Gilbert and Gabe St. Onge over the course of 3 days.
